source: TEXT_GAIUSB809_00918_SEQ_00<tab>When a merchant is wroth, there is usually coin to be made in solving a problem─and Edwyn is looking very wroth indeed.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB809_00918_SEQ_00<tab>キャンプ・ドラゴンヘッドの商人エドウィンには、深刻な悩みがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB809_00918_SEQ_01<tab>An order of ceruleum has yet to arrive from Ul'dah, and Edwyn is furious at the supplier. Go to the markets of the Sapphire Avenue Exchange, find Syntgoht, and /doubt his words, and he may spill the truth.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB809_00918_SEQ_01<tab>エドウィンは、ウルダハの商人に注文した「青燐水」が届かなくて困っているらしい。ウルダハに行き、サファイアアベニュー国際市場の商人「シントゴート」にエモート「問い詰める」をしよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB809_00918_SEQ_02<tab>Under the weight of your skepticism, Syntgoht admits that there is a problem with the ceruleum shipment, and hints that he is as much a victim as Edwyn. His waffling will not do much to ease Edwyn's mistrust of Ul'dahns, you fear.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB809_00918_SEQ_02<tab>シントゴートを問い詰めた。「青燐水」を届けられなかったのは、何か事情があってのことらしいが……。
TEXT_GAIUSB809_00918_TODO_00<tab>ウルダハのシントゴートに「問い詰める」をする

source: TEXT_GAIUSB809_00918_EDWYN_000_000<tab>Hey, you! No time for niceties, I'm waiting on ceruleum. That Ul'dahn cutpurse what calls himself a trader is late with his shipment!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB809_00918_EDWYN_000_000ちょっと聞いとくれよ！
ウルダハの商人に注文した「青燐水」が届かないんだ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB809_00918_EDWYN_000_001<tab>Ceruleum burns like an alewife in winter, and there's no going without it to make the firesand for the ballistas. Curse that Syntgoht... What does he think we're fighting here, ladybugs?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB809_00918_EDWYN_000_001青燐水は、よく燃える青い液体でね。
対竜バリスタ用の火薬を調合するには、欠かせないんだ。
空飛ぶドラゴン族との戦いじゃ必需品なのに、あの商人め！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB809_00918_EDWYN_000_002<tab>You look like you'd enjoy a spot of heat! Find out where my ceruleum order is─go to Syntgoht and, you know, lean on him a little. Question him, like.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB809_00918_EDWYN_000_002あんた、ちょっと頼まれとくれよ。
ウルダハの「シントゴート」って商人を「問い詰め」て、
注文した青燐水はどうしたのか、聞いてきてほしいんだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB809_00918_EDWYN_000_003<tab>I tell you, those Ul'dahns─<var 09 E947 ((keen on being paid, not keen on doing their work!)) ((keen on being paid, not keen on doing their work!)) ((keen on being paid, not keen on doing their work...present company excluded, of course!)) /var> Can't trust 'em, especially that lot on the Sapphire Avenue Exchange!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB809_00918_EDWYN_000_003……まったく、金には細かいクセに仕事は大雑把！
ウルダハの、特にサファイアアベニューの商人ってのは、
ホントに信用できないね！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB809_00918_SYNTGOHT_000_010<tab>Welcome, <var 1A 02 /var>welcome<var 1A 01 /var>! What might a discerning─ Oh, not here to buy? Then might I suggest you browse quietly? I am quite busy.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB809_00918_SYNTGOHT_000_010何だ、俺に用か？
でかい取引のことで頭がいっぱいなんだよ。
用がないなら話しかけないでくれ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB809_00918_SYNTGOHT_000_020<tab>From Edwyn in Coerthas? Oh dear. My friend─may I call you that? Oh, well then, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, there's a problem with the ceruleum and if you think Edwyn is vexed, you have no idea how difficult this is for <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB809_00918_SYNTGOHT_000_020……クルザスのエドウィンさんの使いだって？
ああ、わかってるよ。「青燐水」の件だろ？
実は、こっちだって困ってるんだ……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB809_00918_SYNTGOHT_000_030<tab>Listen, friend, there are only two wares for you here: a <var 1A 02 /var>bargain<var 1A 01 /var>, or <var 1A 02 /var>begone<var 1A 01 /var>! I'm in the midst of inventorying and have no time for your giddy-goat!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB809_00918_SYNTGOHT_000_030なんだよアンタ、冷やかしか？
今、棚卸し中で忙しいんだ。
ほかの店をあたってくんな！
